price: 92. Y se les dirá (a los idólatras): “¿Dónde está aquello que adoraban fuera de Al-lah?
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
